column4: my desktop and wallpaper no longer show .... what setting have i screwed up?
nothing happens when you right click?
right click on the desktop and see
nothing happens ie no choices are given
I would try maybe logging out and back in.  If that doesn't wokr look in gconf-editor apps > nautilus > desktop possibly?
been tryig that .... unfortunately all i have is a plain salmon coloured background and no icons
what were you changing in gconf-editor?
thats where i was when i screwed it up
the stuff in apps nautilus desktop
well in there you can make your icons visible
alright also check apps > gnome > backgournd
seem to have it back, i unchecked then re-checked show_desktop under preferences ... thanks for answering
it was probably just a hiccup with gnome for a minute there.
